Description: Highly available load balancing architecture with automated failover capabilities for financial services payment processing API with 99.99% uptime SLA

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix for resource naming (e.g., dev, staging, prod)

VpcCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid CIDR block in format 10.x.x.x/16

PublicSubnet1CIDR.Description: CIDR block for Public Subnet 1 in AZ1
PublicSubnet1CIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid CIDR block in format 10.x.x.x/24

PublicSubnet2CIDR.Description: CIDR block for Public Subnet 2 in AZ2
PublicSubnet2CIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid CIDR block in format 10.x.x.x/24

PrivateSubnet1CIDR.Description: CIDR block for Private Subnet 1 in AZ1
PrivateSubnet1CIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid CIDR block in format 10.x.x.x/24

PrivateSubnet2CIDR.Description: CIDR block for Private Subnet 2 in AZ2
PrivateSubnet2CIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid CIDR block in format 10.x.x.x/24

InstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for payment processing application servers
InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type

KeyPairName.Description: EC2 Key Pair name for SSH access (optional - leave empty to skip)

LatestAmiId.Description: Latest Amazon Linux 2 AMI ID from Systems Manager Parameter Store

MinSize.Description: Minimum number of instances in Auto Scaling Group

MaxSize.Description: Maximum number of instances in Auto Scaling Group

DesiredCapacity.Description: Desired number of instances in Auto Scaling Group

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer - allows HTTP from internet
Security group for EC2 instances - allows traffic only from ALB

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: Allow HTTP traffic from ALB only

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alarm when 2 or more instances are unhealthy (indicates widespread failure requiring immediate investigation)
Alarm when target response time exceeds threshold
Alarm when 5xx errors from targets exceed threshold
Alarm when 5xx errors from load balancer exceed threshold
Alarm when request count exceeds expected threshold

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix used for this deployment
